'''Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds CD Set''' is ''[[Genshin Impact]]'s'' second original soundtrack CD set. It will be released on February 2023.<ref>miHoYo Gift Shop: [https://www.mihoyogift.com/goods/2021532940683711921152 【原神】「皎月云间之梦」CD 礼盒 Genshin - 原神万有铺子]</ref> The CD set contains the OST album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]'' of three discs "Glazed Moon Over the Tides," "Shimmering Sea of Clouds and Moonlight," and "Battles of Liyue," and additionally, contains the EP album ''[[Fleeting Colors in Flight]]''.
